plugin.name: mpg123
plugin.description: mp3 decoding based on the mpg123 library

element.name: mpg123audiodec
element.description: Decodes mp3 streams using the mpg123 library
element.author: Carlos Rafael Giani <dv@pseudoterminal.org>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/mpeg, mpegversion=(int)1, layer=(int)[ 1, 3 ], rate=(int){ 8000, 11025, 12000, 16000, 22050, 24000, 32000, 44100, 48000 }, channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ], parsed=(boolean)true

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S16LE, U16LE, S32LE, U32LE, S24LE, U24LE, F32LE }, rate=(int){ 8000, 11025, 12000, 16000, 22050, 24000, 32000, 44100, 48000 }, channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ], layout=(string)interleaved
